app.name: Home Purchase Simulator
app.description: Evaluate mortgage scenarios and investment strategies to make informed home-buying decisions.

investing.title: Investing
investing.investUpfrontDescription: If enabled, it is assumed that the upfront capital not used for the purchase is invested from the start.

MainContent.title: Mortgage Decision Calculator
MainContent.description: Evaluate mortgage scenarios and investment strategies to make informed home-buying decisions.

tooltip.monthlyCommitment: The monthly commitment includes mortgage payment, taxes, maintenance, and pledge loan cost (if applicable).
tooltip.totalOutflow: Total outflow is the sum of all monthly expenses related to the property and mortgage.
tooltip.stressTest: The stress test shows the impact on the monthly commitment if the interest rate were to increase by 2.5 percentage points.

Safety.title: Safety Net
Safety.tooltip: Runway indicates how many months you can cover your total outflows with your net income and available cash buffer.

Pledge.description: Current LTV is {current}%. Maintenance limit is {limit}%.
Pledge.warning: You are borrowing more than your safety limit allows.
Pledge.tooltip: The pledge loan status is based on your portfolio's current LTV (Loan to Value) compared to the set maintenance limit.

Chart.title: Net Worth Projection
Chart.tooltip: This chart shows the projected evolution of your net worth over time, considering property appreciation, mortgage payments, and investment growth.

tooltips.netWorth: Hover over the chart to see detailed values for each year
tooltips.homeEquity: Equity built through mortgage payments and property appreciation
tooltips.investment: Value of your invested capital growing at the selected rate
tooltips.debts: Total outstanding debt from mortgage and pledge loans

Costs.title: Cost Breakdown
Costs.tooltip: This breakdown shows the total cost of the mortgage over the full term, including interest paid and cash outlays for maintenance and taxes.

Strategy.title: Strategy Match
Strategy.tooltip: This analysis compares the expected returns from investing your surplus versus the cost of the mortgage and pledge loan.

Amortization.title: Mortgage Amortization
Amortization.tooltip: Visual breakdown of how your mortgage payments are split between principal and interest over time.
